narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Novocure Inc. is a Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies provider based in Portsmouth, NH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $113.1M in Medicaid payments across 15K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $113.1M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,132 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
